name: Doom Desire
effect:
Inflicts Wounds. Strikes at the end of the Round after the next. Bypass Shield Moves and Cover. If the target retires or switches out from battle, the damage will be dealt to the next opponent or to one of its allies. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 7.
 At Gold Rank, this move randomly inflicts Burn, Frostbite or Paralysis when it deals damage.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 10.
 At Diamond Rank, choose at the time of dealing damage which status effect to inflict instead of randomly determining it. Add Badly Poisoned, Drowsy and Confused as additional options.
description: Be careful what you wish for, this Pokemon will read your most intimate wishes and make them come true in very twisted ways.
